price: 4. Magaaloolî marak hebeltô magaalah mara mafinqisinno tet mara edde finqisnaah bayisna waktiy finqah keenih xagne yani kaa akke waytek.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
